stripped_text: This operation costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. Choose a card name. The Runner reveals the grip and trashes all cards with the chosen name revealed this way.
text: This operation costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Choose a card name. The Runner reveals the grip and trashes all cards with the chosen name revealed this way.
title: Salem's Hospitality
